refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the next row from the result data as an object

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: oci_fetch_object returns the next row from the result data as an object, which attributes correspond to fields in statement.
Subsequent calls to oci_fetch_object will return the next row from the result or &false; if there is no more rows.

note.simpara: Don't forget, that Oracle returns all field names in uppercase and attributes' names in the result object will be in uppercase as well.

refsect1.para: See also oci_fetch_array, oci_fetch_assoc, oci_fetch_row and oci_fetch_all.
